sentences.sContent: There was a pause while Alice changed the tape.
sentences.sCn: 艾丽斯换磁带的时候出现了短暂的停顿。

sentences.sContent: After a long pause , she went on.
sentences.sCn: 停了好一会儿，她才继续下去。

phrases.pCn: 踌躇；停下来好好想一想

trans.tranOther: a short time during which someone stops speaking or doing something before starting again
to stop speaking or doing something for a short time before starting again
